tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages
type: Tutorial Step - And the Winner Is...

definition.text: The answer is Size Filled minus Fees Paid! I'll explain why none of the other nodes fit the bill!

paragraphs.text: Target Size: no, because this is just the target we defined!
Size Placed: closer, but no, because the order won't necessarily fill for the exact amount placed, due to decimal roundings or other reasons!
Size Filled: yes! But remember the exchange takes its cut too, so you must subtract the fees!
Can you produce the correct syntax for the formula? Remember you can copy the paths of the nodes holding the data we need!
